body:
### Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.

Temporalite is the old way, CLI is the new. Also, we need to unskip `ExecuteWorkflowAsync_Patched_ProperlyHandled` once we do.

comments.body: This cannot be done until https://github.com/temporalio/temporal/pull/4317 is in the Temporal CLI

title: [Feature Request] Move from Temporalite to Temporal CLI in local testing environment
